author: steffenble

preferences.description: Enter the communication token from your Raycast settings in the Capacities desktop app.

commands.title: Open Space

commands.name: save-to-daily-note
commands.title: Save to Daily Note
commands.subtitle: Capacities
commands.description: Saves a text to today's daily note in Capacities. The text can be formatted in markdown.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
